name: Pixelated Chaos (Marius27)
description:
Create cells - left click/left click and drag Delete cells - right click/right click and drag There are 2 zones, separated by the red line. First zone rules:
  • Any dead cell with 3 or 7 alive neighbors rises from the dead.
  • Any cell alive with 2 or 3 neighbors survives.
  • All other live cells die in the next generation.
Second zone rules:
  • Any dead cell with 3 or 4 alive neighbors rises from the dead.
  • Any cell alive with 3 or 4 neighbors survives.
  • All other live cells die in the next generation.
Team members: Marius Botezatu and his imaginary friends
